website_summaries.verdict: This carbonated classic tastes great on its own, or mixed with a beverage.
pros: Perrier is naturally carbonated from spring water
For those who like a lot of fizziness with their drinks, Perrier has more bubbles than other brands
Some say it's also not as salty as other mineral waters
cons: The extra bubbliness can be harsh on the throat

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived looking like it was used as a punching bag
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when ordering from Amazon. Mine was sold by Amazon LLC, and shipped by Amazon as well. Package arrived looking like it was used as a punching bag. Upon opening the box, the water case inside had been torn open. One of the caps looks like it was chewed on. Plastic is chipped bear the bottle top on a few bottles, which seems really hard to do. Many of the product wrappings are scratched and torn. I really don't know what happened here, but it's unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Loferski

customer_reviews.title: Price changes like bitcoin.  Doubling in value since last October.
customer_reviews.text: Price has doubled since October, this delightfully tasting product now cost twice as much as it did in October. I paid $14 last fall, now over $29 for the exact same product. Seems to have bitcoin like trading value
customer_reviews.author: MarkySparky

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am thankful to get this product and am totally happy with the product. My only recommendation would be to shore up the shipping box. I know the product is heavy but it often breaks the delivery box. Attached are two pictures from today.
customer_reviews.author: Terri DeSio

customer_reviews.title: Good product but bad/inconsistent packaging
customer_reviews.text: I order these a lot but today I noticed a couple of the bottles were leaking. There was no insulation in the packaging, where in the past there has been. I hope Amazon can be more consistent with the packaging in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Superboy

customer_reviews.title: I love the way the carbonation burns my throat
customer_reviews.text: The Perrier subscription through Amazon has been an absolute life saver. After months of driving 100+ miles round trip to purchase a 24-pack of plastic bottles, I can now have it delivered to my door. My only gripe is the price fluctuates which can delay the delivery. I signed up when the cost was just over $16/case and depending on stock, the price increases. Amazon will not ship the product until the stock increases/price drops. That being said, Perrier is addicting. I love the way the carbonation burns my throat; which makes it impossible to ever enjoy regular bottled water again. Perrier also helps with appetite control. The added bubbles allow me to feel full much faster.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: My New go-to drink
customer_reviews.text: Gave up diet sodas. I drank them mostly to "clear" my throat, and, okay, so good with burgers or pizza. After researching sparkling mineral water, the caution was that some are high in sodium. Perrier and a couple of others have zero sodium listed. Not only that, it clears my throat. I like it chilled, but not over ice, for the melting ice compromises the sparkly. A little more: when we lived in Italy, we learned that the children were sometimes given wine that was half water with their meals. When we occasionally have wine, mixing it with Perrier is very good. Purists, it's okay. To each his own.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Piper

customer_reviews.title: Orange and original are so good, green apple is absolutely terrible
customer_reviews.text: Orange and original are so good, green apple is absolutely terrible. No one I know will take it either. Feel bad tossing it. Would recommend sticking to other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Love perrier seltzer water, not what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: It had been quite a while since I have drink Perrier water. I've always loved it since childhood. Needless to say, as with most products these days, it was definitely substandard quality with a lack of CO2. The first few sips are great then the remnants of the drink inside the bottle quickly goes flat. I try not to leave low star reviews and consider every aspect before doing so. But it's just not what it used to be. The flavor was decent but even that wasn't what I expected and not sure it'll be be what you expect, but mainly the CO2 just isn't there 5 minutes into sipping on the bottle, it's flat.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. RL

customer_reviews.title: Very surprising flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find the L'Orange flavor in the 24pk here at Amazon! This was a flavor I've avoided just because I thought I would not like a sparkling lemon-orange flavor of anything. I tried a single bottle bought in a store and I was hooked! Tastes faintly like mt. dew....more reminds me of it (without sugar taste). I don't reach for it as often as lime, but it is nice to have a great tasting option.
customer_reviews.author: NurseKirk

customer_reviews.title: Low Salt is the Key
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I find that one bottle divided into two glasses over ice works perfectly for a meal. There is a huge difference between Perrier and San Pellegrino and it comes down to one word: salt. Whereas SP is very salty, and therefore does not quench your thirst, Perrier is the opposite. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: NJChisoxfan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, ridiculous prices
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen the price of the Lime flavor double in a month; now the lemon-orange has gone up 33% in two weeks. This is ridiculous. i’ll be looking for other options. Edit: And the price for the orange went up another 33% in less than a month
customer_reviews.author: RCW

customer_reviews.title: This is a great alternative to diet pop!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to diet pop! I've found that artificial sugars still make me crave sweets as much as regular sugar, so I decided to stop using any of it! If you want to sweeten this with stevia you can, and add a lime or lemon. I prefer it as is, and the bubbles are great. You can also use it in mixed drinks. I love the lime and lemon flavors, and soon I will be trying the lemon orange flavor. I purchase this item with Amazon subscribe and save which brings the price down way below what I can get in the local grocery stores.
customer_reviews.author: poodleluv

customer_reviews.title: Amazon- learn how to correctly pack items...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff Tools.... at amazon can’t figure out how to correctly pack items This, for example came in an oversized box with a bit of paper, which the case of this water just crushed inside a giant box... After ups and amazon tossed this box around, almost every bottle popped when opened and lost its carbonated properties making the water useless... This can be said for just about any item amazon ships... annoying and frustrating...
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Major Price Changes Crushes Budget!
customer_reviews.text: I read a review about the pricing going up and down like bitcoin. I agree. I have been buying this wonderful product for at least two years and the price varies between $17-$19 dollars which is a great bargain. I bought it last week for $14.00! What a great buy. Shopping today, the lowest price is $27.00! I will continue to check but I regret I didn’t buy 10 cases last week to hold me over for the year. I buy this product EVERY WEEK! Now, it looks like I may as well go to the store. I LOVE Amazon! Bring back the bargain price!
customer_reviews.author: Maldenite

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff...
customer_reviews.text: I drink this stuff all the time and have had trouble finding it in the stores. When that happens, Amazon often saves the day. Less expensive and delivered to the front door - you can't beat that!!!! These babies are heavy so I appreciate it when someone else can carry them for me. Some of the flavored waters are on Subscribe and Save with even more savings - win, win!
customer_reviews.author: C. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Pineapple is the most delicious Perrier flavor yet
customer_reviews.text: Pineapple is the most delicious Perrier flavor yet. I wish it was slightly less expensive, but it’s delicious!
customer_reviews.author: T. Mountain

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite and It's Back!
customer_reviews.text: I am so addicted to green apple, I had it on auto-ship. But then it went missing. A case, if you could find it, was almost $50. Last week, I stumbled onto it again. It was $8 more a case but after quite a while of not having the real thing, it was worth it. I immediately bought two cases. I love green apple so much. I bought a SodaStream and looked for a comparable flavor. Did not find it. Until just recently. There is a green apple flavor you can buy from candyflavors that is almost like it. But still, I'd rather have Perrier's green apple.
customer_reviews.author: Diana E. Lundin

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased Perrier from Amazon for more than a year.
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this for more than a year. Here's what I've experienced: - price varies, the range is btwn $15-40. - sometimes arrives broken. - sometimes different flavor arrives. - delivery sometimes delays, takes 1-3 more days. - it'll be shaken a lot by the time you get so EVERY SINGLE BOTTLE will splash when you open. Hope my review help others.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: This is the best drinking sparkling mineral water ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best drinking sparkling mineral water ever. It has many different flavors and it is best for people who does not like sweet drinks. I like to mixed it with 100% juices instead of drink sodas for diabetic reasons. It is a healthier drink besides water. Love it and definitely recommend it to those who likes pure water and with some non-sweet soda sparkles. Thank you from Hawaii...
customer_reviews.author: Hall Ho

customer_reviews.title: Seems like they changed the formula from the old one
customer_reviews.text: Seems like they changed the formula from the old one. We were buying this for a couple of months then all of a sudden the last couple of batches started to taste very strange with a weird after taste. Stopped buying it and now buying Trader Joe's version, much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking this for some time now and only recently found it here on Amazon. I had already removed soda from my diet, but did miss having a bubbly drink occasionally. This is perfect, just add a few drops of essential oil of choice and it makes a wonderful soda replacement. At $15.99 the first time I purchased, it was a great price. The second time I purchased it had gone up to $17.98. Running the numbers it came in slightly less than what I had been paying at Walmart. I'll continue to purchase as long as the price stays low, otherwise I'll have to return to purchasing it locally.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Bad Flavor...Tastes like flat TAP WATER!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love,,,Sparkling Mineral Water and have been drinking it for "years",,, This is the first time ever I have tried the flavored water. BIG MISTAKE! Never again...it is FLAT,,,there is NO sparkling, wonderful thirst quenching enjoyment I always get from plain sparkling mineral water. This tastes like tap water with no apparent taste of Orange. Will never buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm someone quitting soda and I really love Perrier as a replacement. Has to be cold though, and I recently bought some Lucy's lime juice here on Amazon to spice things up a bit. These bottles are lighter than the conventional glass, and it's a great value delivered to your door. No lugging around a 24 pack which is pretty heavy. I like how I can order these on a subscription, one 24-pack a month. Perfect. Delicious water with carbonation. Great for me and my newly-kicked soda habit! I've already lost a couple pounds since I started last week and I'm keen to see how it goes after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great soda replacement
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge soda drinker, but sometimes I really crave something fizzy in the afternoon. I have one of these in the fridge at all times ready to mix with. It's the perfect soda replacement that is still sweet but healthier. I took off one star because they are pretty expensive for sparkling water, and the price seems to go up and down at this site. However, they are very conveniently packaged and you just can't beat Amazon delivering to your door.
customer_reviews.author: GottaLoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: The pineapple flavor adds the freshness and tropical tastes to the sparkling water. It definitely helps me to drink more.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would taste good since it was flavored
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, I thought this would taste good since it was flavored. I’ve never had a taste for Perrier as I find it too sparkling. The flavoring just underscores it. It’s not a bad product, it’s just an acquired taste I suppose. Now I have a case of this stuff and no one wants it!
customer_reviews.author: sliquejo

customer_reviews.title: Not up to Perrier standards
customer_reviews.text: Terrible stuff with little or no fizz. Some bottles had none to start, others went flat before I could finish the bottle, even though I capped it after each swallow. I didn't care much for the flavor when it fizzed and it deteriorated as it went flat. I don't recommend and will never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: CJ McClain

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought. Doesn't taste anywhere close to spring drinking water.
customer_reviews.text: I got the wrong information about this product as drinking water. I guess you could mix it with juices or make alcoholic beverages with it but when I got a bottle cold and opened it and took a big swallow it tasted like paint stripper to me. Has a taste like a.fountain drink but without the Cola, just carbonated water. I'm sure there's people that can drink this stuff, but it taste nothing like bottled spring water.
customer_reviews.author: Grave Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect every time!
customer_reviews.text: We love the crisp and consistent taste of Perrier. No funny aftertastes, just smooth and effervescent. When we switched from soda to water we all missed the fizz. Fortunately we didn't have to sample too many before we tried Perrier. Now all others taste "wrong" to our home. Additionally, Subscribe & Save drops the price to $0.71/bottle versus $0.75/bottle. Lastly, we love to reuse the bottles for our home-brew concoctions like kombucha and cider. These little bottles are a BIG hit!
customer_reviews.author: DianaBanana

customer_reviews.title: My Soda Substitution
customer_reviews.text: I know I know. It does not taste like soda, but it is doing the trick for me. The carbonation gives me the same sensation as soda and the lemon taste make it taste fresh. A lot of people around me started to have issue with blood sugar level so I cut soda. I am glad that I found this substitution. There was a transition period just like any changes, but this brand is my favorite. It taste good. It is best serve COLD. I add fresh lemon juice in it when I want a stronger lemon favor.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: 45-Ounce Slim Cans version and they seemed to be a better go to
customer_reviews.text: This was my first mineral water purchase. I found that I could never quiet get myself to finish one of these in one sitting. The amount of carbonation in these seems excessive. Not sure if all mineral water comes with the same percentage of carbonation in them or if each brand varies. Luckily, these bottles can be put back in the fridge for late consumption. I also tried the 8.45-Ounce Slim Cans version and they seemed to be a better go to... especially if I don't feel like having left overs. Taste wise, my opinion is neutral. Has a slight orange like taste to them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Kolozvary Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It's like green apple crack.
customer_reviews.text: After mistakenly purchasing this water in a convenience store a few years ago I've been hooked. I recently moved to an area where they have every flavor of Perrier except for green apple. Thank god for amazon. Now I can have my favorite water on hand with the convenience of prime shipping. This is easily, my favorite flavored water.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: They're nicely sized bubbles
customer_reviews.text: The water has bubbles. They're nicely sized bubbles, so if you have a sensitive mouth that can't handle the sting of these man sized bubbles, look for some San Pellegrino or whatever weak mouths drink these days.
customer_reviews.author: BUSINESS MAN

customer_reviews.title: SO REFRESHING!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about the grapefruit, apple, orange or watermelon flavors, but I DO know about the LIME flavored Perrier, and I can say from experience that ice cold, it's THE most refreshing drink in the world! On a hot day, I can easily put away 5 or 6 16.9 oz bottles.....Perrier w/ Lime is SO MUCH more satisfying than any flavored water or diet soda. If you haven't tried it, give it a go....I don't think you'll be disappointed,
customer_reviews.author: AhJay

customer_reviews.title: Perrier ; strawberry flavored
customer_reviews.text: I really like this water . I don't care for regular water . This gives me a kick of carbonation plus a hint of flavor . If I want , I can add flavor to the water . It seems more as if I am drinking a soda . I am trying very hard to get away from drinking regular ( diet ) soda .
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Great Zero Calorie Beverage
customer_reviews.text: I have tried them all looking for a refreshing sparkling flavored water. This is the best there is according to my taste buds. I am going to buy it again many times. The price is right; can't find it in grocery stores and it costs 3 times as much at the local convenience store. Revised review: Still a great drink but all of the offers here are way overpriced. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: LTCUSAF

customer_reviews.title: Hard to believe you can get 24 half-liter bottles for this price
customer_reviews.text: This is a spectacular deal. We love this stuff. The flavors are good and it's way better to have a 16.9 oz bottle you can recap than a 12 oz can you can't. It's always been shipped to us in a box, so it's been in good shape every time we've ordered it. (Now, if we order it at the same time as the pill pocket treats for our cat, those get smashed—but that's not Perrier's fault, it's Amazon's... or mine for ordering them at the same time more than once.)
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gohlke

customer_reviews.title: Glass bottles are overrated.
customer_reviews.text: If you can get over your pretentious beliefs that these do in fact come in plastic bottles, then I think we'll all be okay here. I think we'll all still look sophisticated in public when we order our "perrrrrrreeee-yay"...well, until the day a restaurant brings it in a plastic bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: PACKAGING NOT STURDY ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product a 3 star not because of the Perrier because I love it and order it very frequently. However, on today's delivery, I opened the box to find that the plastic surrounding the 24 bottles had broken and bottles were free to roll around inside the box. They were all intact. I believe that either a sturdier box or air-bubble cushioning between the bottles and the box's interior would alleviate this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Helps my indigestion.  Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I love Perrier. I drink it to help my indigestion. It is super-carbonated mineral water. It kind of stings a little going down, but it really helps settle my stomach. I drink 2-3 packs of Alka-Seltzer daily. I drink this as a healthier alternative. Sometimes I add it to my scotch, of course. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Texas Son

customer_reviews.title: Great! *Peach*
customer_reviews.text: For me this was definitely an acquired taste drinking the mineral water. I like it as an alternative to soda and the peach flavor has just a hint of peach to it. I'm on my 11th case ordered from Amazon and have had nothing but good experience. Everything shows up intact and just like you got it from the store. As far as the flavor goes hopefully you would try it before you bought a whole case because it's not for everyone. But I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I get most all of my Perrier from Amazon because they make it so easy to order and get it at my house without leaving home. I got the variety pack this time and love it. The flavors are different and u I quiet enough to keep me from growing bored with any one flavor. The box they came in was huge so I would prefer if it arrived in a smaller box, but that would be my only complaint because overall I love Perrier.
customer_reviews.author: James Agee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sparkling Water
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Perrier sparkling water and love that it is just delivered to my door automatically every month. The price is fabulous and much cheaper than if I went to the store. The sparkling water itself is the quality product that Perrier always delivers. I have tried to buy the generic sparkling water in the past, but there really is a vast difference in the taste and even in the amount of bubbles. You might have to spend more, but it is so much more enjoyable than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: JBaxter

customer_reviews.title: Good but packaging is bad
customer_reviews.text: Love this water. Never had problems with it being flat or whatever like I read in some of the reviews. I do the subscribe and save so I will update my review if I get a case that is bad. I don’t like that they change the price. Sometimes is 14$ and others it’s 20+ Which I refuse to pay that. 🤷🏽‍♀️ The packaging however is horrible lol the bottles always come out of the casing and are all over the box. Every.single.time. It makes me wonder where this water is coming from 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Unimpressed with the clash of the too-minerally water taste combined with the grapefruit scent. These drinks, as far as I can tell, are NOT "flavored" - they're "scented", which is exactly what I expected, only, I didn't expect the too-minerally taste to still be so overwhelming. Maybe the canned version would be better? Maybe watermelon or strawberry would be better? I dunno, but I'm not going to be buying this version again.
customer_reviews.author: ListFakeNameHere

customer_reviews.title: Love the Taste
customer_reviews.text: I have always enjoyed the taste of Perrier, I realize some may not, but for myself it is totally refreshing with a bit more zip than just water. If you are new to the taste or product, try it from a local store for a week and see if it grows on you. For those like me that know you enjoy the taste, this is a no brainer, and you may be interested in the product below in XL size, I find it works very well in keeping the bottle cold.
customer_reviews.author: Dflynn95

customer_reviews.title: bad package, same taste though
customer_reviews.text: well, 3 star for the taste. I've drinking sparkling water for years now and perrior is my first choice. I perfer glass bottle more because it has a better taste but its quite expensive online. I brought this and it arrived like it had experienced a disaster, like earthquake or something. Theres no wrapping material so therefore the package is broken and bottle were everywhere.. it dont affected the bottle because theres water inside but it do damage the outside box because i can see twist and holes.. dont know if there's any missing bottles, didn't count.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan V

customer_reviews.title: Great as always
customer_reviews.text: Perrier has always been my first choice in sparkling water, mostly because of the amount of carbonation it has compared to others. This was the first time trying out this Pink Grapefruit flavor and I love it. This may sound obvious, but don't expect it to taste like pink grapefruit juice since has no sugar. It's literally a "hint" of the flavor but one that makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: AverageJoe

customer_reviews.title: Green Apple is delicious!
customer_reviews.text: The green apple is like a little bit of sunshine in my day. My whole family loves the flavor, like a green apple jolly rancher but no sweetness. It's fantastic. I've never seen it in stores, we thought, "lets order and give a it try", and we are so glad we did! Now we have three deliveries coming of Perrier (original, grapefruit, and green apple)! All were well packed too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORST TASTING DRINK I EVER ATTEMPTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I realize I should have been aware of the taste since I can easily remember when it was introduced to this country many years back, but I never felt the urge to even try it. I saw the flavored version and with our heat in this area, I figured it might taste refreshing. WHAT A MISTAKE !!! I HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO DRINK MORE THEN A SINGLE MOUTHFUL OF ANY OF THE 3 FLAVORS. WHAT A WASTE ~ I WILL NEVER ALLOW THIS TERRIBLE FLUID TO TOUCH MY MOUTH AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: GthGr8t

customer_reviews.title: San Pellegrino or Perrier?
customer_reviews.text: There is always the debate on San Pellegrino or Perrier. I think whichever one is on sale is a better choice. Taste very similar, however Perrier has less of a mineral taste compared to San Pellegrino. Overall refreshing warm or cold, best enjoyed in a glass cup. Pros: - Refreshing - Reasonable price - Great packaging - Great value Cons: - None
customer_reviews.author: Steven Chan

customer_reviews.title: Why did this almost double in price?
customer_reviews.text: I like to purchase my Perrier online because I have a bad back, and its hard for me to pick it up at a store. I have, according to my past purchase list, bought from the buyer 24 times. My last purchase was Aug 31, it is now Sept 25, and when I went to reorder the same purchase, it had almost doubled in price. What happened in less than a month to justify that? I guess I will have to find someone at the store who can help put it in my cart, because I won't be paying that much. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Evans

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this mineral water. Often, when I get home from they gym, I'm tempted to drink a soda or beer just so I can have a beverage with flavor. The drawback of those two options are the carbs and alcohol. I prefer to be as healthy as I can during the week. Perrier offers me just the right amount of flavor and crispness without any of the calories or alcohol. It hits the spot.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Torres

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carbonated mineral water, it tastes so good, the grapefruit is my favorite so far, it has no real or fake sugar which I like because I love the carbonation but I don’t want the sugar. I have ordered the 24 pack of 16.9ml bottles quite a few times and have not had any shipping problems others have complained about (knock on wood). I just wish it wasn't so expensive!
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Thirst quencher
customer_reviews.text: They taste okay I expected a more pineapple flavor it is very subtle in taste
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised. I am very familiar with this product and have never had this problem before.
customer_reviews.text: Of the 10 bottles opened: 1 had no carbonated water and a very strange taste, 3 bottles had very little carbonated water action, almost flat. Clearly something is wrong and I am very disappointed. To return the unopened bottles would exceed the purchase price. Truly a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: carol W.

customer_reviews.title: Always purchase this on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The best value for this product is here on Amazon. We don't drink soda and this is a family favorite when wanting something bubbly. The one thing I will say is that every once in awhile it seems there is more carbonation in a batch than normal. Not really a big deal but it will fizzle over if opened quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ducky

customer_reviews.title: FLAVORLESS!
customer_reviews.text: I had to keep looking at the bottle to see if I'd ordered the plain or the flavored one! NOT GETTING THE L'ORANGE FLAVOR AT ALL, WONT BUY AGAIN. ***PLUS FED-EX LEFT THIS HEAVY (CURSE WORD) BOX OUTSIDE OF THE LOBBY AND KEPT GOING! HAD IT NOT BEEN FOR THE SECURITY GUARD I MIGHT'VE NOT GOTTEN IT AT ALL! I had to run down stairs go outside in 18 degree weather and pick up this heavy boy and huff-puff to my 7th floor apartment. NOT COOL. And the taste was unimpressive wont buy again!
customer_reviews.author: CINQUE

customer_reviews.title: Ultra fizzy!  My absolute favorite go-to drink!
customer_reviews.text: SOOOO fizzy! My absolute favorite go-to drink! I go through these like water--oh wait!--it IS water! ;) Even Coke pales in comparison to the amount of carbonation in Perrier. Especially good with a little lime or True Lime powdered lime sprinkled on top. I've tried other sparkling waters and they're ok, but none are quite as carbonated as Perrier.
customer_reviews.author: TriplePurple

customer_reviews.title: Perrier Strawberry is delicious
customer_reviews.text: I just love this stuff, I typically have a hard time drinking water all day but since I've gotten hooked on this stuff I can't get enough of it. I didn't care for the watermelon at all and not big on the orange either. I just ordered a green apple so can't wait to try that one. It gets a little expensive to drink it all day long but the case price on Amazon is amazing and free shipping you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kat J Denver

customer_reviews.title: Love this water....but!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this water!! Price the best for the area I live in at $.03/oz. However, Ancestry does not pkg it well, and often when I get the case the box is busted or broken open and therefore the bottles have been jostled around. As a result I have difficulty opening each bottle without having them overflow. I am sure UPS is a part of the problem...but stronger packaging would also help.
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta H.

customer_reviews.title: Orange Perrier is Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Great orange flavor, hard to find in stores on the east coast so I get it from Amazon. Helps with an upset stomach. contains natural ingredients and is not organic, which is preferred, but I drink it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelia B

customer_reviews.title: Good substitute for pop
customer_reviews.text: We drink this all the time. It’s a good substitute for pop. It doesn’t have much flavor to it but I don’t mind the flavor. It’s mostly the fizz that I like. I have added those mio flavor packets to these before and it’s good! These are priced and packaged well. Had no problems with then in shipping and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been a Perrier fan; I much prefer San Pellegrino. But I do enjoy flavored sparkling/mineral waters, & really like grapefruit, so I ordered this. Ugh. The taste was not pleasing to me at all, as I found it quite bitter. Now I'm stuck with 23 remaining bottles I don't like. No more Perrier, ever.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor, long time subscriber
customer_reviews.text: Have been getting these in our monthly subscribe and save for at least a year now. Still enjoy the flavor and haven’t had any significant issues that weren’t addressed with shipping heavy items. We get a few different drinks delivered monthly and occasionally get a damaged shipment or leaker. Expect that with all the handling between the warehouse and our front door and amazon always makes it right.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Creager

customer_reviews.title: Will No Longer Buy at the New Price
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for at least a year, $14 and change for 24 16.9 ounce bottles. Went to order another case today and the cheapest is $22 and change. An increase of $8 in a month? No thanks. I can understand a slight increase occasionally, like a dollar or two, but not this much. Time to find a new favorite drink I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Best alternative to sodas.....besides water of course.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this flavor. I'm so happy that he's found a drink that doesn't contain massive amounts of sugar. I've been trying to get him to stop drinking so much sodas so this is perfect. He loves that it's carbonated and flavored but with no added sugars...... so he doesn't feel like he's going cold turkey on the sodas. I snagged 2 cases for him when they went on sale. Will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: N. Duong

customer_reviews.title: Sparking water??
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this brand my family favorite, but the package wasn't prepared properly, my waters weren't bubbly some were an some weren't , I believe it was thrown into the vehicle on arrival!! To pay that kind of money an not to receive Quality perrier sparkling water. was disappointed an disrespectful.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Currently best deal I can find on Amazon for fizzy water
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a couple weeks ago and am ordering again. If the price stays stable this will be my go-to order for sparkling water. I like topo-chico more but Perrier is sufficient. I don't drive so it' just easier for me to order from amazon. It's nice to not have to worry about going to the store for heavy bottles of water.
customer_reviews.author: LeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Makes Yummy Carbonated Ice!
customer_reviews.text: Makes GREAT Ice! If you are an ice eater, try filling ice trays with Perrier for a zero calorie treat. The bubbles make a lighter, crumbly texture that's easier to chewl like crushed ice. Many people blend the cubes to make a fluffy snow and then place the snow ice into trays, bowls or silicone molds and refreeze it to have a pretty frozen light treat. You can add flavor enhancers or eat it plain. There are tutorials on YouTube and Instagram! Ali Iceberg and Frozenqueen B are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: chelle1969

customer_reviews.title: Best carbonated water on the market - slightly more carbonated than Pellagrino
customer_reviews.text: Peach Flavor: Subtle flavor that is natural tasting and not overall sweet or artificial, at all. This is the only flavor (of sparkling or plain water) that I like. Also love the plain Perrier & the price on here for a 24-pack of the regular size bottles, compared to what the grocery store will charge is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: PERRIER IS PERRIER
customer_reviews.text: Perrier is a great product I give it four stars (rather than 5) as it is in a plastic bottle and glass is preferable However, Amazon's service is just fabulous It arrives at the speed of light and saves me lifting a pretty heavy thing into a shopping cart , taking it out of the cart to put in the car and the same process in reverse when I arrive home. The convenience of having it delivered to my doorstep is appreciated
customer_reviews.author: kimono

customer_reviews.title: Love the water but hate that the bottles cannot recycle
customer_reviews.text: We live in New York and order the water 2 cases every month, but the bottle recycling issue constantly happens. We don't want all the plastic going to waste, but our building does not accept this kind of bottle, maybe learn from other companies that allow/accepting recycling bottles from the stores where it's sold.
customer_reviews.author: PENGQI YIN

customer_reviews.title: Flat upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I finally canceled my subscribe and save for this item after multiple times the packages come damaged and the Perrier has no carbonation to it. It was like drinking regular water. Buying it else where.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Refresh
customer_reviews.text: Missing the carbonation of soda? This is a light, fizzy replacement. I'm not a huge mineral water drinker but the hint of grapefruit has increased my craving for it. Such a perfect size as well.
customer_reviews.author: evs

customer_reviews.title: 24 Count should read "23 count" LOL
customer_reviews.text: Someone along the delivery route got thirsty (evidently) as the top of the shrink-wrap had a 4 inch cut in it and a bottle was missing. This is not a big deal from a monetary standpoint, but the water thief is probably not stealing water only. "...he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much." Luke 16:10
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Perrier Flavor
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, there is no better sparkling water than Perrier. I keep my refrigerator stocked with the different flavors, and the Lime flavor is at the top of my favorite flavor list. The cases I have ordered have all arrived promptly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T NOTICE HOW THESE ARE SMALL BOTTLES (just wasn't paying attention
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting large size bottles. I didn't realize they were small - single use/person sized. I am sure it was just my not paying attention - but I wouldn't have paid so much had I looked at the actual size of the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: JonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Solid if you like Perrier, great if you love grapefruit.
customer_reviews.text: Purely a taste preference. I like it: it's Perrier with a subtle taste of grapefruit. Simple as that. Not sure how else one could describe this product. The shape of the bottle? Ergonomic and fits perfectly in the palm of your hand. The cap? Definitely overusing plastic and bad for the environment, but it spins right off. The price? Very competitive based on what I've seen. Bottom line, you either like pamplemousse or you don't. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Grad Student

customer_reviews.title: Very good treats.
customer_reviews.text: As a diabetic who loves beer, this is my replacement. Initially just plain, but branching out. Lemon and lime were good, but my first trial of peach is amazing. If you want sweet, it isn't here. I prefer savory to tart, so... I will have to try the other flavors now.
customer_reviews.author: doomdforev

customer_reviews.title: Flat
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived and upon drinking it I've discovered that every bottle is flat. I typically purchase Perrier at various stores and have not encountered this issue in the past. While the expiration date is listed as 1/5/2018, the product has clearly gone bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: what happened to Quality at Amazon?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 16.9 fluid oz plastic bottles. I received Perrier in cans. I did not order cans - I have NEVER ordered cans - I do not wish to drink a beverage out of cans, let alone PAY for cans. What has happened to Quality at Amazon? This is the third incorrect order I have had to return since the first of this year. Is Mr. Bazos asleep at the wheel? Very sad for all us customers indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Kott Van Bennekom

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Due to my husband's medical condition, he must drink as many fluids as he humanly can which doesn't sound like an impossible task but he hates plain water and refuses to drink it. This product has changed our lives. I no longer have to beg him to drink. He loves it! Can't wait to try other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Delicious and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Due to my husband's medical condition, he must drink as many fluids as he humanly can which doesn't sound like an impossible task but he hates plain water and refuses to drink it. This product has changed our lives. I no longer have to beg him to drink. He loves it! Can't wait to try other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean

customer_reviews.title: Perrier Carbonated Mineral Water
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, plus buying in bulk with free delivery eliminates the need to lug all that water weight home from the store. I have to admit that I feel a bit guilty about using so much plastic, despite the fact that I recycle everything I can recycle. The water tastes great though, and is my favorite carbonated mineral water.
customer_reviews.author: Herm Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Project great delivery bad
customer_reviews.text: Perrier is great. What is not great is UPS is using sure post so all of these bottles are delivered to our local post office and they are too bulky and heavy for post office people to deal with. I don't think your post is supposed to deliver heavy bulky objects like this.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: All bottles of water flat second shipment in damaged packaging
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two cases and these two particular cases were all flat. I order these monthly and have never had this problem. When I ordered another unit of this water it was all spilled out in the box. Am I supposed to count them now to see if all bottles are in the box?Unreal
customer_reviews.author: fran pete

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful "fizzy water" (seltzer) we are enjoying this thirst quenching and refreshing new Perrier addition very much good chilled or at room temperature! Cane say enough - would do 10 stars if I could!!! This and the strawberry one - oh, YES!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mountainlady

customer_reviews.title: My favorite.
customer_reviews.text: For years I scoffed at Perrier drinkers. For years I was a fool. It's not a "pretentious water drinkers" water - Perrier is refreshing, bubbly water that completely stopped me from drinking sugary sodas. A few weeks in Europe and I came home itching for Sparkling water....And the US has few options. That is when I found out what the fuss really was with Perrier. Great Price on Prime Day for my favorite drink, which we have in our fridge now always.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: love this, depends on what price you buy it ...
customer_reviews.text: love this, depends on what price you buy it ($12-$13) is the good price if you like strong sparkling water this is for you. also i seen many reviews about packaging to be honest, i ordered 20 times by now, and it all got in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Expiration date for my case was a week after I received it. Ridiculous for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Seph H.

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Perrier has a nice clean taste. This price can't be beat-- it's cheaper than I find at our local chain supermarkets. I also use Subscribe & Save so that makes it even cheaper. I order, Amazon ships, UPS carries it to my door- what could be bad?
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as usual
customer_reviews.text: I order this water a lot. It usually comes in two boxes. This time it came in one. I opened the box and the bottles were all over the place! Not a single bottle in the plastic packaging ! Was very inconvenient with placing the order in the house. Kind of disappointed in the delivery this time....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: My entire family loves Perrier and I normally purchase it by the case. I pay about $5.00 more and then I have to load it in my cart, load it in my car, take it home and unload it. I thought I'd see if it was available on Amazon and was delighted to see it was available and at a much better price. Buying it this way is not only less expensive but also much more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Was wonderful - now not so much
customer_reviews.text: Perrier tastes so much better than other brands of sparking water that it is totally worth the high price. I love this water. It is crisp and sparkly; very refreshing. Thank you, Amazon. Update- I just reordered this and the package boxes were ripped and damaged. Several cans are dented. Never had this problem before. Lowered the rating considerably.
customer_reviews.author: sopraminervaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Flat
customer_reviews.text: Have been a big fan of flavored Perrier for years. Happy to see it was available on Amazon in bottles (had been buying in the slim cans). Loved the convenience and flavor options offered by Amazon. However, the carbonation is hit or miss when ordering through Amazon. This has happened with several flavors, so seems to be a storage issue. Would not recommend purchasing this product through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Susin61

customer_reviews.title: Great Sparkling water
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy drinking sparkling water alot, any time I find a great price on sparkling water I buy it up. At the risk of sounding snooty...Perrier is smoother than San Pellegrino, but San Pellegrino has more flavor to it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The best flavor, HANDS DOWN!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Watermelon Perrier it's my favorite flavor! It's actually cheaper to order them hear because I have to search for the where I live, which takes gas, and when I find the they are $1.60 so I'm here for it!😂
customer_reviews.author: TARMS81

customer_reviews.title: Price Gouging
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Unfortunately the price has gone up from $12.92 on Feb 19, to $19.88 in the last three weeks. Shame on the price gouging.
customer_reviews.author: P. L. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Tasty sparkling water
customer_reviews.text: It is not very easy to find carbonated water in the USA. This one is one of the few brands easily available for purchase. I really like this water. It tastes good and the carbonation helps me when I am very thirsty, especially on a hot summer day. The water bottles are made from plastic and are recyclable. I like the fact that this pack of 24 bottles is available for delivery, so that I don't have to go look for it in different stores. The regular price is a little on the high side for me, but occasional sales make it a easy purchase. I would recommend this water.
customer_reviews.author: Seech
